be.schilduil.games.tekris
Class TeKrisBlock

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--be.schilduil.util.Grid
        |
        +--be.schilduil.games.tekris.TeKrisBlock
public class TeKrisBlock
extends Grid

The TeKrisBlock class represents a block in the TeKris game written for www.tentenkamp.be (TK in short, hence the T.K...).

Website

http://www.schilduil.be/java/TeKris.html
